00021 template < typename _Obj >
00022 class Iterator {
00023 public:
00024  virtual ~Iterator() {}
00025  virtual Iterator* copy() const = 0;
00026  virtual bool isValid() = 0;
00027  virtual void next() = 0;
00028  virtual bool operator==(const Iterator& other) const = 0;
00029  bool operator!=(const Iterator& other) const { return ! ((*this) == other); }
00030  virtual _Obj get() = 0; // this has to return a valid obj if valid == true
00031  //_Obj* operator->() { return &get(); }
00032  
00033  typedef ::Ref< Iterator > Ref;
00034 };
00035 
00036 template<typename _STLT, typename _T>
00037 class STLIteratorBase : public Iterator<_T> {
00038 protected:
00039  typename _STLT::iterator i;
00040  _STLT& obj;
00041 public:
00042  STLIteratorBase(_STLT& o) : i(o.begin()), obj(o) {}
00043  STLIteratorBase(const STLIteratorBase& it) : i(it.i), obj(it.obj) {} 
00044  virtual bool isValid() { return i != obj.end(); }
00045  virtual void next() { ++i; }
00046  virtual bool operator==(const Iterator<_T>& other) const { const STLIteratorBase* ot = dynamic_cast< const STLIteratorBase* > (&other); return ot && &ot->obj == &obj && ot->i == i; }
00047 };
00048 
00049 
00050 template<typename _STLT, typename _T>
00051 class STLIterator : public STLIteratorBase<_STLT, _T> {
00052 public:
00053  STLIterator(_STLT& o) : STLIteratorBase<_STLT, _T>(o) {}
00054  STLIterator(const STLIterator& it) : STLIteratorBase<_STLT, _T>(it) {} 
00055  virtual Iterator<_T>* copy() const { return new STLIterator(*this); }
00056  virtual bool operator==(const Iterator<_T>& other) const { const STLIterator* ot = dynamic_cast< const STLIterator* > (&other); return ot != NULL && STLIteratorBase<_STLT, _T> :: operator == ( other ); }
00057  virtual _T get() { return * STLIteratorBase<_STLT, _T> :: i; }
00058 };
00059 
00060 template<typename _STLT, typename _T>
00061 class STL_MapIterator : public STLIteratorBase<_STLT, _T> {
00062 public:
00063  STL_MapIterator(_STLT& o) : STLIteratorBase<_STLT, _T> (o) {}
00064  STL_MapIterator(const STL_MapIterator& it) : STLIteratorBase<_STLT, _T> (it) {} 
00065  virtual Iterator<_T>* copy() const { return new STL_MapIterator(*this); }
00066  virtual bool operator==(const Iterator<_T>& other) const { const STL_MapIterator* ot = dynamic_cast< const STL_MapIterator* > (&other); return ot != NULL && STLIteratorBase<_STLT, _T> :: operator == ( other ); }
00067  virtual _T get() { return STLIteratorBase<_STLT, _T> :: i -> second; }
00068 };

00070 template<typename _T>
00071 struct CArray {
00072  _T* array;
00073  unsigned long len;
00074  CArray(_T* a, unsigned long l) : array(a), len(l) {}
00075 };
00076 
00077 template<typename _T>
00078 CArray<_T> Array(_T* a, unsigned long l) { return CArray<_T>(a,l); }
00079 
00080 template<typename _T>
00081 class CArrayIterator : public Iterator<_T*> {
00082 private:
00083  unsigned long i, len;
00084  _T* array; 
00085 public:
00086  CArrayIterator(const CArray<_T>& a) : i(0), len(a.len), array(a.array) {} 
00087  CArrayIterator(const CArrayIterator& it) : i(it.i), array(it.array) {} 
00088  virtual Iterator<_T*>* copy() const { return new CArrayIterator(*this); }
00089  virtual bool isValid() { return i < len; }
00090  virtual void next() { ++i; }
00091  virtual bool operator==(const Iterator<_T*>& other) const { const CArrayIterator* ot = dynamic_cast< const CArrayIterator* > (&other); return ot && ot->array == array && ot->i == i; }
00092  virtual _T* get() { return &array[i]; }
00093 };
00094 
00095 template< typename __T, typename __C >
00096 typename Iterator<__T>::Ref GetIterator(__C& s) { return s.iterator(); }
00097 
00098 template< typename _T >
00099 typename Iterator<_T>::Ref GetIterator(std::set<_T>& s) { return new STLIterator<std::set<_T>,_T>(s); }
00100 
00101 template< typename _T >
00102 typename Iterator<_T&>::Ref GetIterator(std::list<_T>& s) { return new STLIterator<std::list<_T>,_T&>(s); }
00103 
00104 template< typename _T >
00105 typename Iterator<_T&>::Ref GetIterator(std::vector<_T>& s) { return new STLIterator<std::vector<_T>,_T&>(s); }
00106 
00107 template< typename _T, typename _KT >
00108 typename Iterator<_T&>::Ref GetIterator(std::map<_KT, _T>& s) { return new STL_MapIterator<std::map< _KT, _T >, _T& >(s); }

00110 inline
00111 Iterator<char&>::Ref GetIterator(std::string& s) { return new STLIterator<std::string,char&>(s); }
00112 
00113 inline
00114 Iterator<char>::Ref GetConstIterator(std::string& s) { return new STLIterator<std::string,char>(s); }
00115 
00116 template< typename _T >
00117 typename Iterator<_T const&>::Ref GetConstIterator(std::vector<_T>& s) { return new STLIterator<std::vector<_T>,_T const&>(s); }

00122 template< typename _T >
00123 typename Iterator<_T*>::Ref GetIterator(const CArray<_T>& s) { return new CArrayIterator<_T>(s); }

00126 #define foreach( t, el, s ) for( Iterator<t>::Ref el = GetIterator(s); el->isValid(); el->next() )
